            java.lang.String surname,

            java.lang.String NIF,
            java.lang.String profile,
            java.lang.String CCNumber,
            Application app)
     throws WrongProfile
        Constructor of user
        Parameters:
        name - of the user
        surname - of the user
        username - of the user
        password - of the user
        NIF - of the user
        profile - : depending of the type of user. O if it's a host , D if it's a guest, and OD if it's both .The administrator will have the profile list empty
        CCNumber - of the user
        app - related to the user
        Throws:
        WrongProfile - if the type of profile to create is wrong

      • banUser

        public java.lang.Boolean banUser​()
        Bans a user, changing his state to banned an removing his access to the app Only the admin or the system can ban users. The system bans users only when there is a problem in the payment.
        Returns:
        true if the user is banned
        Throws:
        BanException - if someone who isn't the admin or the System tries to ban an user

      • restoreUser

        public java.lang.Boolean restoreUser​(Application app)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Restore an user that had been banned, changing his state to disconnected and restoring his acces to the app.If debt is not 0, pays the user(only happens in host mode) the money to be paid
        Parameters:
        app -
        Returns:
        true if the user is restored correctly
        Throws:
        NotAdmin - if someone who isn't the admin tries to restore an user
        java.lang.Exception

      • changeProfile

        public java.lang.Boolean changeProfile​(java.lang.String prof)
                                throws WrongProfile
        Changes from the Host profile to the guest and from the guest to the host
        Parameters:
        prof -
        Returns:
        true if everything is correct
        Throws:
        WrongProfile - if the user tries to change to a profile that doesn't exist

      • isHost

        public java.lang.Boolean isHost​()
        Returns:
        true if the user is Host, false otherwise

      • isGuest

        public java.lang.Boolean isGuest​()
        Returns:
        true if the user is Guest, false otherwise

      • isAdmin

        public java.lang.Boolean isAdmin​()
        Returns:
        true if the user is the admin, false otherwise
